this is what its saying in russian :


"16 ??????? play, all that it is necessary to make - simply ??????????????? and to launch file iw4mp in the folder with play. We start further alterIWnet _ configure and we record name. After that, in order to play on Lan, we open file alterIWnet by the notebook and instead of Server=5.162.87.209 we record ip server. Before launch of play, we start file IWNetServer from folder Server Debug, we after that start file iw4mp, in play - search of plays (this action is obligatory for all, who wants to play on Lan)"
